Text.content:
While a content type can be displayed in different variations with the help of different formatters, the formatters themselves can have design variations. A simple example: an alert UI component typically occurs in four different states—success, warning, info, error—with each state represented by a another color like green, orange, blue, and red.

Combinations of design variations for a UI component can be realized with the help of Element settings.
